bool.name: use_construction_range_on_selection
bool.comment: Network of Castles bonus is the reason for this selection range difference

template_reference.name: kill_action_tree
template_reference.comment: Check these weird values that inherit oddly

instance_reference.name: attachments
instance_reference.comment:
Outskirts go here. Removed until a fix for selection is in. To add back, copy and paste the following into this field:
<instance_reference name="attachments" value="attachments\attachment_lists\civilizations\english\outskirts\general\towncenter_01" />
